title: Essential’s never-released smart speaker surfaces running Android on its circular display
content:
The now-defunct Essential only ever released its PH-1 smartphone, a device I personally loved. But before that, the company had promised to release “Essential Home,” a unique smart speaker that unfortunately never made it to market. Now, though, a prototype has popped up online.

more…

The post Essential’s never-released smart speaker surfaces running Android on its circular display appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A prototype of the never-released "Essential Home" smart speaker has surfaced on eBay, confirming the device may have run Android.
